description: Canada production hardening backlog for IMMCAD API, ingestion, and compliance workflows.

userStories.title: Add domain-leak scanner for Canada scope
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want automated scanning for disallowed India-domain terms so that Canada scope regressions are blocked in CI.
acceptanceCriteria: Add a scanner script that flags disallowed India-domain terms in source/docs paths with an explicit allowlist for legacy archived files
Script exits non-zero when violations are found and prints file/line context

userStories.title: Wire domain-leak scanner into quality gates
userStories.description: As a release owner, I want CI to enforce domain leakage checks so that jurisdiction mismatches are caught before merge.
acceptanceCriteria: Integrate domain-leak scanner into Makefile quality target
Add scanner execution step to quality-gates workflow

userStories.title: Add audit log events for policy blocks and provider failures
userStories.description: As an operator, I want structured audit events for high-risk chat outcomes so that incidents can be triaged quickly.
acceptanceCriteria: Emit structured log entries containing trace_id, event_type, and minimal non-PII metadata for policy_block and provider_error paths
Add tests validating log emission in both scenarios

userStories.title: Add ingestion checkpoint recovery runbook
userStories.description: As an on-call engineer, I want a documented checkpoint recovery playbook so that ingestion can be safely resumed after failures.
acceptanceCriteria: Document checkpoint file location, corruption recovery, and replay procedure

userStories.title: Add release artifact verification checklist step
userStories.description: As a release manager, I want release-gates to verify required evaluation artifacts exist and are readable so that sign-off is evidence-based.
acceptanceCriteria: Add a script that validates required eval artifacts exist with non-empty content
Run this script in release-gates before completion
